SEARCH
Package polimi.ingsoft.client.ui.gui

Class UIModel

java.lang.Object
polimi.ingsoft.client.ui.gui.UIModel
public class UIModel extends Object
The UIModel class holds the data required for the GUI. It includes match details, game state, player settings, public and private boards, player hands, and chat messages.
